grith.jgrith.voms.VOManagement
Class VOManagement

java.lang.Object
  grith.jgrith.voms.VOManagement.VOManagement

public class VOManagement
extends Object

Manages all VOMS servers that are of interest for the user. Information about these servers can be found in the $HOME/.glite/vomses or /etc/grid-security/vomsdir directory. Every file which contains a line like

"Chris" "vomrsdev.vpac.org" "15003" "/C=AU/O=APACGrid/OU=VPAC/CN=vomrsdev.vpac.org" "Chris"

describes one VO: "Chris" is the name of the VO, followed by the hostname of the VOMS server and the port the VO is mapped to. After that the DN of the host of the VOMS server and I don't know what the last "Chris" means.

Author:
Markus Binsteiner

getAllFqans

public static Map<String,String> getAllFqans(GSSCredential cred,

Queries all VO servers for all of the users fqans. Returns either the full fqan or just the VO/Group part of it

Parameters:

returnWholeFqan - whether to return the full fqan (true) or not (false)

Returns:
